snippet: SHAPIRO--Joan, beloved wife of Stanley, devoted mother of David, Daniel and Peter Shapiro and Jini Hahn, loving grandmother of 10 and dear sister of Donald Propper and the late Robert Propper. Service 12noon on Sunday at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Joan, beloved wife of Stanley, devoted mother of David, Daniel and Peter Shapiro and Jini Hahn, loving grandmother of 10 and dear sister of Donald Propper and the late Robert Propper. Service 12noon on Sunday at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ. 1/3
